title: Aromatherapy Crystal Candles
description: Unlock your inner zen with a Craft & Kin Crystal Candle. Each candle is thoughtfully created with the highest-quality ingredients and oils to scent any space.
cleaned_text: - STRONG SCENT: This six-ounce luxury crystal candle is made with the finest essential oils to bring you a strong, lasting scent. - PREMIUM SOY CANDLE: This 100% natural soy wax, cotton wick candle is non toxic and long burning (35 hours!). Craft & Kin's healing candles with crystals inside are made with essential oils that bring a beautiful fragrance to any space. - THE PERFECT GIFT: Our crystal scented candles are the perfect gift for every occasion, including holidays, anniversaries, birthdays, or just-because gifts to make someone feel special. Each candle comes in luxury, ready-to-give gift packaging. - OUR MISSION: The Craft & Kin Collection is carefully designed and crafted with your home and family in mind. We believe that your home should be a collection of people and things you love. Our mission is to help you craft a little more of that love with your kin.
